publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-102 Susan Deacon: Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning—That the Parliament’s Health and Community Care Committee in consideration of the Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning) (Orkney) (Scotland) Order 1999, SSI 1999/27, recommend that the order be approved.

S1M-102 Susan Deacon: Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning—That the Parliament Health and Community Care Committee in consideration of the Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning) (Orkney) (Scotland) Order 1999, SSI 1999/27, recommend that the order be approved.
S1M-102 Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning (lodged on 27 August 1999) Robin Harper*
